About.Acquisition focus: The Archive not only documents the operations of the Theatre since it started operations as a performing arts centre in 1990, but also preserves documents, photographs and objects connected with the history of the performing arts in Ballarat and region.

About.Major holdings: Original photographs of local performers and performances, playscripts, programs, handbills and fliers of performances at her Majesty's and elsewhere in the Ballarat region. Arabella Goddard collection. Eustace Dunn collection.
